PS3 , wd smartware,  ApleTV etc don't support rips made with very high encoding settings, frames, weighted B & pyramidal Frames etc.
This means that you will only be able to play rips encoded with lame settings so much poorer quality. There are ps3 teams around who supply them.

The best player is the pc ;-) with HDMI cable, through 10 meters cable I can play flawlessly 1080p + DTS. 

By the way Fantec makes much better stuff which plays the rips encoded with v high enc settings + dts.
